description:
1). i had create an instance
# nova list
+--------------------------------------+-------+--------+------------+-------------+---------------------------------------------------------+
| ID                                   | Name  | Status | Task State | Power State | Networks                                                |
+--------------------------------------+-------+--------+------------+-------------+---------------------------------------------------------+
| 40c65eed-7339-4a3a-a838-0c564bc78bcd | test1 | ACTIVE | -          | Running     | private=10.0.0.25, fd28:29fc:e927:0:f816:3eff:fe36:3666 |
+--------------------------------------+-------+--------+------------+-------------+---------------------------------------------------------+

2). and i forget the password.So, i have to reset the password for my instance
# nova set-password 40c65eed-7339-4a3a-a838-0c564bc78bcd
New password: 
Again: 
ERROR (Conflict): Failed to set admin password on 40c65eed-7339-4a3a-a838-0c564bc78bcd because error setting admin password (HTTP 409) (Request-ID: req-4bfdc3c7-058d-4742-a414-ee1f99698f68)

at the end, i get the 409 return code.
should i do other things before i change the password?? or this is a bug?
title: nova set-password returns confusing error message

comments.content:
1). i had create an instance
# nova list
+--------------------------------------+-------+--------+------------+-------------+---------------------------------------------------------+
| ID                                   | Name  | Status | Task State | Power State | Networks                                                |
+--------------------------------------+-------+--------+------------+-------------+---------------------------------------------------------+
| 40c65eed-7339-4a3a-a838-0c564bc78bcd | test1 | ACTIVE | -          | Running     | private=10.0.0.25, fd28:29fc:e927:0:f816:3eff:fe36:3666 |
+--------------------------------------+-------+--------+------------+-------------+---------------------------------------------------------+

2). and i forget the password.So, i have to reset the password for my instance
# nova set-password 40c65eed-7339-4a3a-a838-0c564bc78bcd
New password: 
Again: 
ERROR (Conflict): Failed to set admin password on 40c65eed-7339-4a3a-a838-0c564bc78bcd because error setting admin password (HTTP 409) (Request-ID: req-4bfdc3c7-058d-4742-a414-ee1f99698f68)

at the end, i get the 409 return code.
should i do other things before i change the password?? or this is a bug?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~zhaozhilong

comments.content:
Thanks for taking the time to file a bug! What version of Nova are you currently running? (eg, Liberty, Kilo, Mitaka, master...)

Can you also provide steps to reproduce this error?

Thanks!
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~auggy

comments.content:
Hi Augustina Ragwitz ..
My code is clone from master ..
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~zhaozhilong

comments.content: Can you please have a look at this. http://docs.openstack.org/admin-guide/compute-admin-password-injection.html
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~pushkar-umaranikar

comments.content: While I agree the message wording comes across awkward, the message is vague by design to avoid revealing password information to the API caller. There will be more useful information in your logs. If you are unable to troubleshoot the issue after checking your logs and believe this is a bug, please feel free to reopen this issue.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~auggy
